thread.section_title: Hotel des Arts - Montmartre - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful first stay
thread.title_full: Beautiful first stay - Review of Hotel des Arts - Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Aisha M
title: Beautiful first stay
text: Hotel is situated very close to Moulin Rouge and a few minutes from the Metro. There are plenty of places to eat. Maud was fantastic. She made us feel very welcome, she even booked a few places for us and not to mention the beautiful card and champagne she organised for us. Thank you, Maud. You are so lovely inside and out. We will come again.
